text: Black Widow is a 1987 mystery crime thriller movie directed by Bob Rafelson and stars Debra Winger, Theresa Russell, Sami Frey, Dennis Hopper, and Terry O'Quinn. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1987 crime thriller movies Category:1980s mystery movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies directed by Bob Rafelson Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Black Widow (1987 movie)
